phrs.translation: 在听力所及距离(或范围)之内，听得见
不在听力所及范围；听不见

sentences.sentence: Shaun was in the bedroom, out of earshot, watching television.
sentences.translation: 肖恩在卧室里看电视，听不到。

sentences.sentence: We waited until Ted was safely out of earshot before discussing it.
sentences.translation: 我们一直等到特德保准听不见时才讨论这事。

sentences.sentence: As she came within earshot of the group, she heard her name mentioned.
sentences.translation: 当她走到能听见这群人说话声时听到有人提她的名字。
